trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanging"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanging"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: ComponentChangingEventArgs provides data about a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanging> event.
trans-unit.target: ComponentChangingEventArgs inneholder data om en <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanging>hendelse.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanging>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanging> event notifies the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> and registered event handlers that a particular component in the current design document is about to be changed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanging>hendelsen varsler den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService>og registrert hendelsesbehandling som en bestemt komponent i utformingsdokumentet er ferd med å bli endret.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanging>

trans-unit.source: This event provides a widely accessible method to prevent a component from changing.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen inneholder en tilgjengelighet tilgjengelig metode for å hindre at en komponent endrer.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanging> event is raised before a component is changed.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanging>denne hendelsen oppstår før en komponent er endret.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanging>

trans-unit.source: This event provides an opportunity for a designer to abort the change.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen gir mulighet til en designer til å avbryte endringen.

trans-unit.source: Component designers typically raise the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanging> event automatically.
trans-unit.target: Komponenten utviklere vanligvis hever den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanging>hendelsen automatisk.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanging>

trans-unit.source: If a property cannot be changed, the method that handles the event can throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en egenskap ikke kan endres, kan metoden som behandler hendelsen Iverksett et unntak.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a designer file is checked into source code control, the handler of this event typically throws an exception if the user refuses to check out the file.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis en designer fil er sjekket inn kontroll av kildekode, oppstår behandlingsprogrammet av denne hendelsen vanligvis det et unntak hvis brukeren nekter å sjekke ut filen.

trans-unit.source: A ComponentChangingEventArgs provides the following information: - A `Component` property that indicates the component that is about to be modified.
trans-unit.target: En ComponentChangingEventArgs inneholder følgende informasjon: – en `Component` egenskap som angir komponenten som skal endres.

trans-unit.source: - A `Member` property that indicates the member that is about to be changed.
trans-unit.target: – En `Member` egenskap som angir medlemmet som er i ferd med å bli endret.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangingEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangingEventArgs"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangingEventArgs> indicates the component and member that are about to be changed.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangingEventArgs>angir komponent og medlemmet er i ferd med å bli endret.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangingEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The component that is about to be changed.
trans-unit.target: Komponenten som skal endres.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MemberDescriptor"></xref> indicating the member of the component that is about to be changed.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MemberDescriptor"> </xref> som angir medlem av komponenten som skal endres.

trans-unit.source: Gets the component that is about to be changed or the component that is the parent container of the member that is about to be changed.
trans-unit.target: Henter komponenten som skal endres eller komponenten som den overordnede beholderen for medlemmet som er i ferd med å bli endret.

trans-unit.source: The component that is about to have a member changed.
trans-unit.target: Komponenten som skal ha et medlem som er endret.

trans-unit.source: Gets the member that is about to be changed.
trans-unit.target: Henter medlemmet som er i ferd med å bli endret.

trans-unit.source: This property is `null` if the member is unknown.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er `null` Hvis medlemmet er ukjent.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MemberDescriptor"></xref> indicating the member that is about to be changed, if known, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> otherwise.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MemberDescriptor"> </xref> som angir medlemmet som skal endres, hvis kjent, eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> ellers.
